texts.name: Desini
texts.biography: Desini was a granddaughter of a known merchantman, who used to make long distance trips to support various countries - very often in a state of war.It was a dangerous operation however well paid in such uncertain times.Desinis parents died of disease plague, so she stayed with his grandfather aboard his ship.She was 8 years old,when an unfortunate government pirate attack suprised them.The ship has been sunk.She was small so she managed to survive the masacre unseen.She landed on an unhabited island of the near archipelago.While trying to get to the high spot of the island she fell to an unusual nest with huge, red glowing egg.Before she had time to get amazed,she heard a high pitched sound.She looked back and saw an enormous fire bird that looked at her with interest.To her suprise the bird didnt do anything to her.She was allowed to come and go whenever she wanted.After some time the egg hatched.Months have passed,and having no people around, Desini have become attached to the unusual,very inteligent birds and formed a friendship.After 2 years or so,when Desini gave up thought of any person coming here,unsuspectedly a beautiful ship has arrived at the island.It happened to be a sorceress that came to check on natural phoenix habitat of this archipelago.The meetimg was unexpected for both.Desini joined the sorceress so she could travel aboard her ship, which she loved the most and at the same time watch over the birds she found so marvelous

specialty.description: Keeps positive/neutral morale with any creature alignment
specialty.name: Peace Keeper

texts.name: Kilyne
texts.biography: Kilyne has always been a curious mind.By studying the moon,its magnetic power and making various ore experiments,she soon realised how beneficial results it can give.Long years of energy manipulation have helped her to multiply natural magnetic fields.Using it for her own protection was a natural thing to do...

specialty.description: Ability to use Magnetic Force Field
specialty.name: Moon Protection

specialty.description: Fire Shield 10% damage rate for all allied creatures
specialty.name: Fire Shield

specialty.description: 15% Bonus to Sorcery skill per level
specialty.name: Sorcery
